constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 51 (Thursday, March 18, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. MOORE of Alabama:
H.R. 2047.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8 of the United States Constitution
[Page H1584]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Economic Opportunity.

title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to expand eligibility for Post-9/11 Educational Assistance to members of the National Guard who perform certain full-time duty.
